body: $PQEFF so I was a little off on the timing. But for my next prediction: we will be heading straight for the 40s and 50s soon. I know I would rather sell my shares for $0.58 rather than tender at $0.59.
So the SP will be hovering up there between the people who feel the same as me vs others.
